Class PlasmaDrill

java.lang.Object
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.Component
org.example.galaxy_trucker.Model.Tiles.PlasmaDrill
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PlasmaDrill extends Component
The PlasmaDrill class extends the Component class and represents a specialized game component with additional functionalities such as rotation, validation, and interaction with the player's board.
See Also:

    • PlasmaDrill

      public PlasmaDrill()

  • Method Details

    • rotate

      public void rotate(Boolean direction)
      Changes the direction of the cannon by rotating either clockwise or counterclockwise.
      Specified by:
      rotate in class Component
      Parameters:
      direction - If true, rotates the cannon clockwise. If false, rotates the cannon counterclockwise.

    • controlValidity

      public boolean controlValidity(PlayerBoard pb, int x, int y)
      Checks the validity of placing the PlasmaDrill component on the player's board based on its current cannon direction and the specified coordinates.
      Specified by:
      controlValidity in class Component
      Parameters:
      pb - the player's board object containing the current state of the game board
      x - the x-coordinate on the board where the action is being validated
      y - the y-coordinate on the board where the action is being validated
      Returns:
      true if the placement or positioning is valid; false if it conflicts with the rules

    • accept

      public void accept(ComponentAction visitor, PlayerState State)
      Accepts a visitor implementing the ComponentAction interface to perform a specific action on the PlasmaDrill component within the context of the provided player state. This method leverages the Visitor design pattern to allow encapsulated logic for actions specific to the PlasmaDrill component, without modifying the component itself.
      Overrides:
      accept in class Component
      Parameters:
      visitor - the ComponentAction visitor that defines the logic to apply to this component
      State - the current state of the player, used to determine the effects of the action

    • insert

      public void insert(PlayerBoard playerBoard, int x, int y)
      Inserts the current PlasmaDrill component into the specified player's board at the given position. Updates the plasma drills power on the player board based on the type and cannon direction.
      Specified by:
      insert in class Component
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the PlayerBoard instance where the PlasmaDrill is to be inserted
      x - the x-coordinate of the position where the PlasmaDrill is placed
      y - the y-coordinate of the position where the PlasmaDrill is placed

    • remove

      public void remove(PlayerBoard playerBoard)
      Removes this PlasmaDrill component from the specified player's board and updates its state accordingly.
      Specified by:
      remove in class Component
      Parameters:
      playerBoard - the player's board from which this PlasmaDrill is to be removed

    • getCannonPower

      public double getCannonPower()
      Calculates and returns the power of the cannon based on its type and direction.
      Returns:
      the cannon power as a double. If the cannon type is 2 and direction is 1, it returns 2. If the cannon type is 2 and direction is not 1, it returns 1. Otherwise, it returns 0.

    • clone

      public Component clone(PlayerBoard clonedPlayerBoard)
      Creates a clone of the current PlasmaDrill instance, copying its state including CannonDirection and type, and associates it with a specified PlayerBoard.
      Specified by:
      clone in class Component
      Parameters:
      clonedPlayerBoard - the PlayerBoard to which the cloned PlasmaDrill will be associated. This parameter is not directly utilized for creating the clone but indicates the applicable context.
      Returns:
      a new PlasmaDrill instance with the same CannonDirection and type as the original.
